pages.policy: Privacy Policy - Glamour Oasis nav{ border: 3px solid #fbd2c0; } main{ margin: 100px 0; } h1{ margin-bottom: 40px; } h2{ font-size: 30px; margin-bottom: 10px; } h3{ margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 24px; } p{ margin-bottom: 20px; } Home Our services Team Contacts Privacy Policy Last updated: February 18, 2024 This Privacy Policy tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You. Interpretation and Definitions Interpretation The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions. The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural. Definitions For the purposes of this Privacy Policy: Account means a unique account created for You to access our Service or parts of our Service. Affiliate means an entity that controls, is controlled by or is under common control with a party, where "control" means ownership of 50% or more of the shares, equity interest or other securities entitled to vote for election of directors or other managing authority. Company (referred to as either "the Company", "We", "Us" or "Our" in this Agreement) refers to GlamourOasis. Device means any device that can access the Service such as a computer, a cellphone or a digital tablet. Service refers to the Website. Service Provider means any natural or legal person who processes the data on behalf of the Company. It refers to third-party companies or individuals employed by the Company to facilitate the Service, to provide the Service on behalf of the Company, to perform services related to the Service or to assist the Company in analyzing how the Service is used. You means the individual accessing or using the Service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Service, as applicable. Data Security We take appropriate measures to protect the security of your information. However, please be aware that no data transmission over the internet is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee the security of information transmitted to our website. Links to Other Websites Our Service may contain links to other websites that are not operated by Us. If You click on a third party link, You will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise You to review the Privacy Policy of every site You visit. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update Our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify You of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. We will let You know via email and/or a prominent notice on Our Service, prior to the change becoming effective and update the "Last updated" date at the top of this Privacy Policy. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, You can contact us: By email: GlamourOasis@gmail.com By phone number: +9-165-79245876 By mail: Likhiria Road, Tusura, Odisha 767067, India Home Our services Team Contacts +916579245876 GlamourOasis@gmail.com Terms & Condition Privacy Policy
pages.services: Services - Glamour Oasis Home Our services Team Contacts Explore our comprehensive range of beauty and wellness services designed to pamper and rejuvenate. From luxurious spa treatments to expert hair care and exquisite nail services, we are dedicated to helping you look and feel your best. Discover the perfect combination of indulgence and professionalism with our expertly curated selection of services tailored to meet your every need." Our services Hairdressing services Haircuts: Our experienced stylists provide precision haircuts tailored to your preferences and face shape, whether you're looking for a classic style or a trendy cut. Styling: From sleek and straight to voluminous curls, we offer professional styling services for any occasion, using quality products to achieve the perfect look. Coloring: Whether you want to cover gray, add highlights, or completely change your hair color, our color specialists will help you achieve the desired result with precision and care. Manicure and pedicure services Manicure: Treat your hands to a pampering session with our manicure service, which includes nail shaping, cuticle care, exfoliation, and polish application for beautifully groomed nails. Pedicure: Relax and rejuvenate tired feet with our pedicure service, which includes nail trimming, callus removal, exfoliation, massage, and polish application for soft and smooth feet. Gel polish: For long-lasting color and shine, try our gel polish service, which provides chip-resistant manicures and pedicures that can last up to several weeks. Nail extensions: Achieve the length and shape you desire with our nail extension service, using high-quality materials and expert techniques for natural-looking results. Aesthetic skin treatments Facial cleansing: Our facial cleansing treatment deeply cleanses the skin, removing impurities, excess oil, and dead skin cells to reveal a brighter, smoother complexion. Peeling: Exfoliate and renew your skin with our peeling treatment, which helps to improve texture, reduce fine lines and wrinkles, and promote cell turnover for a more youthful appearance. Moisturizing: Hydrate and nourish your skin with our moisturizing treatment, which replenishes moisture levels, restores balance, and leaves your skin feeling soft, supple, and radiant. Waxing services Our waxing services offer efficient and effective hair removal for various areas of the body, including the legs, arms, underarms, bikini area, and face, using gentle wax formulas to minimize discomfort and irritation. Spa treatments Massage: Relax and unwind with a rejuvenating massage, tailored to your needs, whether you prefer gentle relaxation, deep tissue therapy, or targeted muscle relief. Aromatherapy: Enhance your spa experience with aromatherapy, which uses aromatic essential oils to promote relaxation, relieve stress, and uplift your mood. Body wraps: Detoxify and nourish your skin with our body wrap treatments, which help to eliminate toxins, improve circulation, and leave your skin feeling smooth, firm, and revitalized. Hair care services Treatment: Restore and revitalize your hair with our nourishing treatment options, designed to repair damage, improve texture, and enhance shine for healthier-looking hair. Hydration: Replenish moisture levels and combat dryness with our hydrating hair treatments, which infuse moisture into the hair shaft, leaving your locks soft, smooth, and manageable. Restoration: Repair and strengthen damaged hair with our restorative treatments, which target specific concerns such as breakage, split ends, and chemical damage, restoring vitality and resilience to your hair. Makeup Everyday makeup: Enhance your natural beauty with our everyday makeup service, which includes light coverage, neutral tones, and subtle enhancements to create a fresh and polished look for any occasion. Evening makeup: Make a statement with our evening makeup service, featuring bold colors, dramatic effects, and sophisticated techniques to elevate your look for special events, parties, or nights out. Bridal makeup: Look radiant on your wedding day with our bridal makeup service, tailored to your bridal style, preferences, and wedding theme, ensuring you feel confident and beautiful on your special day. Nail care procedures Polishing: Keep your nails looking polished and pristine with our nail polishing service, which includes buffing, shaping, and applying your choice of nail polish for a flawless finish. Strengthening: Strengthen weak or brittle nails with our nail strengthening treatment, which fortifies the nails with nourishing ingredients and protective coatings to prevent breakage and promote healthy growth. Cuticle care: Maintain healthy cuticles and prevent hangnails with our cuticle care service, which includes gentle trimming, moisturizing, and conditioning to keep your nails and surrounding skin looking neat and tidy. Home Our services Team Contacts +916579245876 GlamourOasis@gmail.com Terms & Condition Privacy Policy
